data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 2, Wagner Reway signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Internacional's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Everton Felipe for the away team is judged to be offside.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Internacional.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 12, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wagner Reway awards the away team a throw-in.
Wagner Reway awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 14, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Damian Musto is booked for the home team.
In the minute 16, Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 20, Praxedes (Internacional) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Internacional.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
Eder Ferreira (Goianiense GO) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Marcos Guilherme for Internacional drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional drive upfield and William Pottker gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Goianiense GO drive forward but Matheuzinho is judged offside.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
William Pottker gets his shot on target but fails to score for Internacional.
In the minute 30, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Porto Alegre Goianiense GO's Hyuri is caught offside.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Hyuri for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 37, Wagner Reway awards Internacional a goal kick.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 41, Goianiense GO's Matheuzinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Jussa (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
At Estadio Beira-Rio the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
The first-half is over at Estadio Beira-Rio.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 47, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Goianiense GO defence as Praxedes fires in a strike for Internacional.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
In the minute 49, Patrick (Internacional) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Wagner Reway signals a Internacional throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jean, who is down injured.
In the minute 51, Jean is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Goal! Internacional have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Damian Musto.
In the minute 52, That's a fine assist from Peglow.
Wagner Reway awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 54, Internacional's William Pottker gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 57, Everton Felipe (Goianiense GO) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
He's off! William Pottker is shown a red card.
Attention is being given to Goianiense GO’s Edson Junior and play has been suspended briefly.
Goianiense GO's Edson Junior is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Edenilson is on a sub for Praxedes for Internacional.
Internacional make their second substitution with Thiago Galhardo replacing Peglow.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
Wagner Reway signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Internacional's half.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
In the minute 65, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
The away team replace Moacir with Chico.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
Patrick (Internacional) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 69, Goal! Thiago Galhardo extends Internacional's lead to 2-0.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Jorginho's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jussa.
The away team have replaced Matheuzinho with Vitor Leque. This is the second substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
In the minute 73, Matheus Vargas is replacing Jorginho for Goianiense GO at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Jussa returns to the field for Internacional after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 74, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Rodrigo Lindoso is replacing Marcos Guilherme for the home team.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Internacional.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
Eduardo Coudet is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Moises replacing Patrick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 79, Wagner Reway awards Internacional a goal kick.
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Marcelo Lomba has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
In the minute 82, Goianiense GO push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Marlon Freitas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
Junior Brandao is replacing Hyuri for the away team.
Edenilson of Internacional is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, Wagner Reway signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Internacional's area.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Internacional.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Internacional.
Wagner Reway awards the home team a throw-in.
Wagner Reway will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Matheus Vargas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Matheus Vargas of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Wagner Reway awards Internacional a goal kick.
Free kick Internacional.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Wagner Reway blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
Jean (Goianiense GO) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Thiago Galhardo extends Internacional's lead from the spot. They now lead 3-0.
